views.name: Default view
views.description: The default view of the data.

views.name: Correlative SIM and FIB-SEM of mitochondria and endoplasmic reticulum
views.description: Predictions of mitochondria membrane were used to automatically register super-resolution light microscopy images with FIB-SEM images of the same sample. Here, FIB-SEM images, mitochondria predictions, and endoplasmic reticulum predictions are overlaid with PALM images of the mitochondria and endoplasmic reticulum.  For more description please reference Fig. 4 and Fig. S11 of Heinrich et al., 2020. (Note the direction of transformation here is the inverse)

views.name: Correlative PALM and FIB-SEM of mitochondria and endoplasmic reticulum
views.description: Predictions of mitochondria membrane were used to automatically register super-resolution light microscopy images with FIB-SEM images of the same sample. Here, FIB-SEM images, mitochondria predictions, and endoplasmic reticulum predictions are overlaid with SIM images of the mitochondria and endoplasmic reticulum.  For more description please reference Fig. 4 and Fig. S11 of Heinrich et al., 2020. (Note the direction of transformation here is the inverse)
